title: Requirements Gathering for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Identify and document functional and non-functional requirements for the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Design Architecture for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Develop the high-level and detailed design of the system architecture for the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Database Design for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Design the database schema and data models required for the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Frontend Design for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Create the user interface design and layout for the frontend of the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Backend Development for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Develop the backend services and APIs required for the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Integration Testing for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Perform system-level integration tests to verify the correct functioning of the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Deployment Plan for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Create a deployment plan and execute the deployment of the GeothermalResidentialSystem.

title: Security Assessment for GeothermalResidentialSystem
description: Perform a security assessment to identify and address any vulnerabilities in the GeothermalResidentialSystem.
